metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart and the player wrestle with the nature of their romance, when it has already been stated that Shadowheart must dedicate herself to Shar, leaving no room for others in her life. She helps the player to interpret this in a manner that may let them bend the rules. Heavy on the flirtation and innuendo, as if to defect from less-romantic implications of their relationship status.Chronologically, this will occur after SH has committed to Shar by sacrificing Nightsong, but before the shar path sex scene that centres around a Nightfall ceremony.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Have shadowheart as partner2. Be in act 33. Be on shar path4. Go to camp

50.speaker: Shadowheart
50.text: Lady Shar's blessings be upon you.
50.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

26.speaker: Shadowheart
26.text: What's that look you're giving me? I feel like a mouse cornered by a cat.
26.context: NodeContext: Tiny hint of wariness. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

34.speaker: Player
34.text: You and me... it's an odd sort of love that we share. Help me understand it.
34.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

19.speaker: Shadowheart
19.text: It can be difficult to explain, if you don't worship the Nightsinger yourself... but I'll try.
19.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

44.speaker: Shadowheart
44.text: Lady Shar respects cunning. And that's exactly what you and I will need to demonstrate, if you want this to continue.
44.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

47.speaker: Shadowheart
47.text: Rules are perhaps not always meant to be broken, but they are always intended to be bent. That kiss we shared wasn't my first, you know. Far from it.
47.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

22.speaker: Shadowheart
22.text: Lady Shar's initiates... we weren't supposed to have relationships. Or flings. Not even stray trysts. And yet... we found a way.
22.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

30.speaker: Player
30.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

42.speaker: Shadowheart
42.text: You can frame many acts as service to the Dark Lady, if you put your mind to it. Seduction can be a worthy form of subterfuge. A snatched moment can practise the art of stealth.
42.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

5.speaker: Shadowheart
5.text: And making a lover wait...? Well, there's few finer torments, if you know what you're doing...
5.context: NodeContext: Sly/knowing. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

28.speaker: Shadowheart
28.text: As long as my actions can be thought of as honouring Shar, or honing skills in her service... there is a great deal of flexibility to be had.
28.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

38.speaker: Player
38.context: NodeContext: The serious bit - core issue that they face as a couple. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

40.speaker: Shadowheart
40.text: The catch is this: I can't truly love you. Not like most define it. I'll always have to keep a place for Lady Shar.
40.context: NodeContext: The serious bit - core issue that they face as a couple. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

43.speaker: Shadowheart
43.text: But you're clever, willing, and flexible... you needn't feel left wanting.
43.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

36.speaker: Shadowheart
36.text: I'll give you all that I can. Just don't call it love.
36.context: NodeContext: 'That's the deal. Hope you like it' Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: I really want to kiss you right now.
31.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

6.speaker: Shadowheart
6.text: I know you do... but I'm not going to let you. Not just yet...
6.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

46.speaker: Shadowheart
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Leans forward slightly to whisper.NodeContext: Leans in slightly and whispers. Callback to something she just said moments earlier about making a lover wait. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

12.speaker: Player
12.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

41.speaker: Shadowheart
41.text: Perhaps you do, but let's leave no doubt - I can't truly love you. Not like most define it. I'll always have to keep a place for Lady Shar.
41.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Honing skills? What do you mean?
0.context: NodeContext: Teasing. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

51.speaker: Shadowheart
51.text: Well... let's just say I can play the innocent when needed, have a lighter touch than you might expect, and can untie many knots with just my mouth. Practical skills, learned in service of Lady Shar.
51.context: NodeContext: Teasing. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

29.speaker: Shadowheart
29.text: But you need to understand the limitations. I can't truly love you. Not like most define it. I'll always have to keep a place for Lady Shar.
29.context: NodeContext: The serious bit - core issue that they face as a couple. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: I don't want to feel like some teenager, sneaking around.
35.context: NodeContext: Flirty. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

4.speaker: Shadowheart
4.text: Don't you? It might be more interesting than you realise...
4.context: NodeContext: Flirty. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: Is this where you tell me all about your former flames?
8.context: NodeContext: 'don't worry about the details' Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

11.speaker: Shadowheart
11.text: Don't worry. Even if I could remember them, none could withstand comparison to you.

45.speaker: Player
45.context: NodeContext: 'don't worry about the details' Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: I remember plenty - just not everything. I might not recall everything from my past, but I know my name. I can still walk and talk. I know words of devotion to Lady Shar and where to strike a leg in order to sever the main artery.
1.context: NodeContext: 'don't worry about the details' Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

21.speaker: Shadowheart
21.text: Imagine how much of a chore I'd be to have around if I truly remembered nothing.
21.context: NodeContext: 'don't worry about the details' Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

25.speaker: Player
25.text: I can be very discreet. Shar won't know a thing.
25.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

33.speaker: Shadowheart
33.text: Good. Then hopefully you'll understand exactly what I mean...
33.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: As you mentioned Shar... is she truly going to prevent us from being together?
7.context: NodeContext: Conflicted - involved with the player but sworn to her goddess. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: I don't know what to say... we're already together as much as Lady Shar allows. Is that not enough for you?
2.context: NodeContext: Conflicted - involved with the player but sworn to her goddess. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

48.speaker: Player
48.text: If I can be with you, it is.
48.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

24.speaker: Shadowheart
24.text: You can - if you understand how to reconcile certain... eccentricities in our relationship.
24.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

15.speaker: Player
15.text: I don't know. What do we even have?
15.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: Perhaps not. This feels like a half-measure.
18.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

16.speaker: Shadowheart
16.text: It's only a half-measure if you don't allow yourself to consider it otherwise.
16.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: Don't worry - I won't paw at you.
23.context: NodeContext: Cheeky. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

13.speaker: Shadowheart
13.context: NodeContext: Cheeky. Arc: Shar path. Trying to define what a romantic relationship is, when she's been told she has no room to love anyone but her goddess.

10.speaker: Player
10.text: In all seriousness, I want to talk about us. Help me understand exactly what you and I have - and what we don't.

17.speaker: Player
17.text: About Shar... she isn't truly going to prevent us from being together, is she?
